subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: David Nalbandian handed Rafael Nadal his most lopsided defeat in three years with a 6-1, 6-2 victory yesterday in the Madrid Masters quarterfinals in Spain. Nalbandian will play Novak Djokovic, who defeated Mario Ancic, 7-6 (2), 6-2. Roger Federer will play Nicolas Kiefer in the other semifinal.
